topics.body:
"@Randomosaur":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5350b49c63687271ff4b0200#post_5350b49c63687271ff4b0200
I played that game.
It was incredible!

The graphic were smooth, even compared to today's games.
I love how sometimes disasters happen.
Best part is that you can interact with the dinosaurs using either cars or helicopters.
The content was a little low though.

Overall, pretty good game.
Best zoo game I played was Zoo Tycoon.

topics.body:
Fallout 2 reminded me why I preferred jrpgs and why I think Yahtzee is offbase.
Yahtzee dislikes the encounter system.

Well F2 doesn't have one like that. You fight enemies by gettig newr them and initiating combat. As a result F2 is a lot clunkier than a jrpg.

And Yahtzee was not a big rpg guy.

So there.
